PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13572022-12-15PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisRe-appointment of MICHAEL GOLDBLOOM, C.M., of Westmount, Quebec, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective March 29, 2023.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Re-appointment of MICHAEL GOLDBLOOM, C.M., of Westmount, Quebec, as Chairperson of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective March 29, 2023.
